Impossibly Thin

SlendeCase is the thinnest case on the market. At just .35mm, it protects your phone from everyday scratches and dings without the added bulk.

360o Coverage

Unlike other slim cases, SlenderCase protects every edge of your iPhone with precision-crafted polypropylene. With full-access to every port, you'll never have to take it off.

Protect Your Camera

SlenderCase features a molded rear bumper to protect your rear camera. Take the pressure off of your lens and let your phone rest flat.
